item.title: Award 2024 at 9:00 AM EDT on Fri, Mar 3, 2024
item.description: Educational Award For Outstanding Contribution to Computational Science Education The ACM SIGHPC Education Chapter is announcing an upcoming call for nominations for the 2024 education award to recognize outstanding contributions to computational, data-enabled science, and HPC education and training in all disciplines. The call for nominations will be issued in March, 2024 with a deadline for submissions on May 31 2024. We are seeking candidates who have led projects or programs that have made significant contributions to computational science education defined broadly to include all disciplines and all education levels.
